title.native: ラブライブ！The School Idol Movie
title.romaji: Love Live! The School Idol Movie
title.english: Love Live! The School Idol Movie

description:
Although μ's, the defending champions of the school idol tournament, plans to dissolve their group after the graduation of their senior members, they receive news that leads them to holding a concert event! The 9 girls continue to learn and grow in this new and unfamiliar world. What is the last thing that these girls can do as school idols? With the clock ticking, what kind of meaning will the μ's members find in performing the most exciting live performance?

(Source: NIS America)
synonyms: Love Live! School Idol Project Movie

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Dancing
tags.description: Centers around the art of dance.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: School Club
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a school club scene.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Foreign
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a country outside the country of origin.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Cosplay
tags.description: Features dressing up as a different character or profession.

tags.name: Language Barrier
tags.description: A barrier to communication between people who are unable to speak a common language.

tags.name: Tomboy
tags.description: Features a girl who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of boys.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

node.description:
[Website](http://www.yatate.net/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/yatate_hajime) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/矢立肇) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hajime_Yatate)

Hajime Yatate is a collective pseudonym for [Sunrise](https://anilist.co/studio/14/)'s staff.

Sakurako’s work is based on her own experiences, with [Sister Princess](https://anilist.co/manga/38414/) coming from having a brother, [Strawberry Panic!](https://anilist.co/manga/34974/) coming from attending an all-girls school, and [Baby Princess](https://anilist.co/manga/38676/) from having a lot of cousins.
Originating from Studio WHO. Currently affiliated with [CloverWorks](https://anilist.co/studio/6222/CloverWorks).
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/1391356994)
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/minase0924)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/oitan125) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/花田十輝)

Jukki Hanada is a Japanese screenwriter and novelist. He is the grandson of literary critic and essayist Kiyoteru Hanada. He formerly belonged to [Takao Koyama's](https://anilist.co/staff/117575/Takao-Koyama) Brother Noppo anime scenario house. He's currently affiliated with SATZ.

He's a big fan of professional baseball and supports the Hiroshima Toyo Carp.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/asakonishida) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/24387) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/西田亜沙子)

Originating from Studio Muu.


Married to fellow animator [Seiichi Nakatani](https://anilist.co/staff/107409/Seiichi-Nakatani).

__Height:__ 150 cm

[Official Site](https://aina-kusuda.net) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kusudaaina) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/kusudaaina)

[Official Website](https://aya-uchida.net) | [Website](https://columbia.jp/uchidaaya/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/ichigoshiroppu/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/aya_uchida) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aya_Uchida) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%86%85%E7%94%B0%E5%BD%A9)

She is a Japanese voice actress and singer affiliated with JTB Entertainment. She also a member of famous media franchise "Love Live!".

__Non-anime roles:__
- Quency - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)

__Height:__ 153cm

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/nittaemi85) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/tnstagram1210/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCY9FmjWlKE1aqMcbkgsGYqQ)

__Birth Name:__ Izumi Arai (新井泉)

[Profile (81 Produce)](https://www.81produce.co.jp/actor_search/index.php/item?id=237) | [Official blog](https://ameblo.jp/number-373/)

The female half of the musical duo [TWO-MIX](https://anilist.co/staff/102352/).

Married mangaka [Gosho Aoyama](https://anilist.co/staff/97804/) (creator of _Detective Conan_) on her birthday, May 5, in 2005. Later divorced on December 10, 2007.

**Non-Anime Roles:**
• Fu Hua (Honkai Impact 3rd)

__[Official Website](https://pile.asia/) | [Official Blog](https://lineblog.me/pile_official/) | [Old Blog](https://ameblo.jp/pile0502/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/pile_eric) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/pi_channnn52/)__

Pile is a Japanese singer and voice actress. She is of Japanese and Korean descent.

__Height:__ 157 cm
__Weight:__ 46 kg

[Website](https://iida-riho.com/) | [Profile](https://www.houeishinsha.co.jp/h_detail_sptalent.cgi?OFFICE=T&KIND=1&ID=51efb7ec_6622) | [Blog](http://gree.jp/iida_riho/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/rippialoha) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/rippi_ii/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCx6-VxBUu65TR0PctsyQb8g) | [Niconico](https://ch.nicovideo.jp/rihoism) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Riho_Iida) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/飯田里穂)

Riho Iida is a Japanese ex-child model-turned-actress, voice actress and singer.

__Height:__ 159 cm

[Website (Avex)](https://avex.jp/tokuisora/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/tokui_sorangley) | [LINE Blog](https://lineblog.me/tokuisora/) | [Blog (old)](https://ameblo.jp/tokui-sora/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ8Wj4izZCt1i9gdTXnbD_Q) | [Bilibili](https://space.bilibili.com/524622683) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sora_Tokui) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%BE%B3%E4%BA%95%E9%9D%92%E7%A9%BA)

**Non-Anime Roles**:
- Blanc - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Hook - Honkai: Star Rail (VG)

__Agency:__ Hibiki

[Website](http://mimorin.com/) | [Profile (Hibiki Cast)](https://hibiki-cast.jp/hibiki_f/mimori_suzuko/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mimori_suzuko)  | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/mimorin.official/) | [LINE Blog](https://lineblog.me/mimori_suzuko/)

**Non anime roles:**
- Sangonomiya Kokomi - Genshin Impact (VG)
- Match - Kirara Fantasia (VG)
- Pinkie Pie - My Little Pony Friendship is Magic (Japanese dub)
- Rapunzel - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)

__Height:__ 150 cm

[Fanclub](https://www.gokinjolno.jp/) | [Blog](http://nanjolno.jugem.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/nanjolno) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/nanjolno/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFJORT2GGeNsKKLCf3BqSEQ)

She was the vocalist of the band fripSide and graduated in April 2022 with the fripSide Phase 2 Final Arena Tour. Likes cats, Final Fantasy XIV (even dubbed and sung the battle theme of Suzaku), and ramen.

**Non anime roles:**
- Soltina - Memento Mori (VG)
- Noise - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Topaz - Honkai: Star Rail (VG)
- Shu - Arknights (VG)
- Junah - Metaphor: ReFantazio (VG)
- Trigger - Zenless Zone Zero (VG)

__Agency:__ Stay Luck

[Website](http://shikaco.jp/) | [Profile](https://stay-luck.com/talent/kubo-yurika/) | [Blog](https://lineblog.me/shi_ka_co/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/info_shikaco) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/shi_ka_co) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/Shikaco.Official) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCpzXQvqfLeXFSV59lPkFZsQ)

__Non-anime roles:__
- Noir - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Kachina - Genshin Impact (VG)
- Shishidou Izumi - Blue Archive (VG)

__[Website](https://akihata.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/akihata_jp) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/akihata.jp/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/c/AKIHATAjp)__

__Aki Hata__ is a Japanese vocalist, lyricist, composer and member of the music production team [Q-MHz](https://anilist.co/staff/156926/QMHz).

[Website](https://zaqzaqzaq.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/zaxic_r) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/zaq39/)

ZAQ began to learn the piano at age three. During her college years, her idol was Minori Chihara, and it was during this time she decided to become a singer. However, she failed all her auditions. In junior high school, her favorite bands were Mongol800 and Going Steady, two rock groups which she was addicted to. Self-taught, her composing and works were characterized by a unique style which is unrestricted by music theory and musicology.

[Website](http://meganebanchow.com/) | [Blog](http://meganebanchow.jugem.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/MeganeBanchow)

Also worked on the music for Denpa Onna to Seishun Otoko as part of the unit Franz Maxwell I.
